Html:
Hi Guys,

I've installed v1.4.3 through Nuget, I think the tool is great, but am encountering what appear to be old reported bugs.

Namely http://htmlagilitypack.codeplex.com/workitem/28756 and http://htmlagilitypack.codeplex.com/workitem/29233 have these fixes not been applied to the version on nuget yet?

Also the latest source here is v1.4.0, does that include these fixes? Otherwise how would one go about applying the patches? 28756 includes a diff file, how would one apply that to the source downloaded?

Many thanks,

P.
